subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Carolina Hurricanes have agreed to terms with veteran captain Rod Brind'Amour for a new five-year contract worth $18 million, keeping him with the franchise he led to the Stanley Cup. The new contract announced by the team yesterday replaces an option that the team and Brind'Amour had for next season.
